title: Greenes farewell to folly Sent to courtiers and schollers as a president to warne them from the vaine delights that drawes youth on to repentance. Robert Greene vtriusque Academiæ in Artibus magister.
author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.
publisher: By Thomas Scarlet for T. Gubbin and T. Newman,
notes: Running title reads: Greene his farewell to follie.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
